Package net.heroicefforts.viable.android

Interface Summary
NetworkDependentActivity Interface implemented by Activities that rely upon NetworkDependentDialog to manage connectivity failures.
 

Class Summary
AbstractIssueListActivity This is the abstract template class for handling the display of a list of Issues.
AppStatsActivity Activity for displaying the summary info and vital issue tracking statistics of a project.
BugReporterActivity This class handles the collection and submission of user issues.
Config Constant class containing constants for logging optimization.
CrashReceiver This class receives crash report intentions from other applications and invokes Viable, if necessary.
Error Utility class for alerting users to errors that bubble to the UI in a uniform fashion.
IssueSelectionAdapter This class handles the binding of IssueResources to the issue type spinner views (i.e.
IssuesListViewBinder Binds issue values to the list view.
IssueTabsActivity The main activity for Viable.
IssueViewActivity This activity displays the Issue details source from either the local content repository or the issue application's remote repository.
LocalIssueListActivity This class handles the retrieval of user specific issues locally stored on the phone.
NetworkDependentDialog Monitors network connectivity.
R  
R.array  
R.attr  
R.drawable  
R.id  
R.layout  
R.string  
R.xml  
RemoteIssueListActivity This class handles the display of issues fetched from remote repositories.
UninstallActivity This Activity class handles user uninstallation comments and submits them to the appropriate issue tracker belonging to the uninstalled application.
